ConfigParam.name: GC_LOG_DIRECTORY
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies a directory where the media stack can create log files to.

ConfigParam.name: GC_ENABLE_AUTOMATION
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to enable automation for 3rd party applications.

ConfigParam.name: GC_SCHEDULE_PREFERENCE
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies task scheduling preference.

ConfigParam.name: GC_ADD_TASK_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator receives a task. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_REMOVE_TASK_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator closes a task. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_CONTACT_HISTORY_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when downloading the contact history belonging to the active task. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_DEFAULT_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator closes each task. Valid parameters: gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_DEFAULT_HISTORY_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator has no active task. Valid parameters: gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_CONTACT_SEARCH_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to search for contacts. Valid parameters: gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_CONTACT_EDIT_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to modify the contact's properties. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_CAMPAIGN_HELP_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to get some help related to the current campaign. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_SWAP_CONTACT_SEARCH_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to replace the current contact record with another one. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_CONTACT_PRINT_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where the content of the contact record can be printed. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_EMAIL_CONSTRUCT_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to send an email to the contact. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_EMAIL_DISPLAY_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to display an email. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_EMBEDDED_EMAIL_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies an URL where to navigate when the operator wants to open contact history with embedded email editor. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_AGENT_WALLBOARD_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to load urls and scripting mode from this configuration file or use global agent policies

ConfigParam.name: GC_EXTERNAL_APP_CMD
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies a command line to execute each time when operator receives a task. Valid parameters: db_[fieldname], sd_[fieldname], gc_operatorname, gc_operatorpwd, gc_unique

ConfigParam.name: GC_FORCE_BUSINESS_TAG_SELECTION
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to force operator to select business tag when closing a task.

ConfigParam.name: GC_PLATFORM_TYPE
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies the type of the underlying UC platform. Supported platforms: Microsoft, Avaya

ConfigParam.name: GC_WEB_SERVICES_URL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies the URL through which Client Access Services (CAS) can be accessed

ConfigParam.name: GC_POPUP_WORKCODE_WINDOW
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to display a window with the list of workcodes when operator decides to change to auxiliary status

ConfigParam.name: GC_DISABLE_RECORDING_CONTROL
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to enable operators to pause and continue recording

ConfigParam.name: GC_ENABLE_SUBJECT_SELECTION
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to enable operators to select subjects to work on

ConfigParam.name: GC_AGENT_PLUGIN_1
ConfigParam.Description: Plugin to be loaded by agent application. Plugins must extend the Com.Geomant.CE.AgentPlugin.AgentPluginBase abstact class defined in AgentPlugin.dll

ConfigParam.name: GC_LIMIT_PREVIEW_RINGING_TIME
ConfigParam.Description: It specifies whether to apply maximum ringing time specified in dialing rules to preview calls as well

ConfigParam.name: DYN_FLOW_USAGE
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to use DynFlow integration and the new layout or not

ConfigParam.name: DEFAULT_AUTH_MODE
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies the default authentication mode

ConfigParam.name: USE_LOCAL_CONFIG
ConfigParam.Description: Specifies whether to load urls and scripting mode from this configuration file or use global agent policies
